item.description:
Dear Friends,

Donna, one of dear book group members, invited us to her house on November 26, Friday. We will get together at Hopedale only for the November meeting. Other meetings will take place at Borders in Shrewsbury as usual.

Thank you Donna! It is very kind of you to host November meeting at your house.

I will email the address, parking info and Donna's cell phone number to book group members who RSPVed "Yes" for November meeting.

Just a reminder about what we will do at November meeting;
We'll discuss a "Mother Teresa" book. Any book about "Mother Teresa" is fine. You can get one from your library. We will take turns to talk about Mother Teresa and what we find in our books. If you cannot read a book, you can just sit, relax and listen the discussion. It is always good to get together and share.

ps. Donna got the book “The Miracle of Love” about Mother Teresa of Calcutta , her Missionaries of Charity, and her Co-Workers*. She loves this book and suggests it.
item.name: November Meeting change of place
